message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180. Is this something you'd be interested in?
I'm really interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

I understand that $180 is a bit steep for you, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. How about we meet in the middle at $150? It's the minimum I'm willing to sell it for, but I think it's a fair price considering the value the product brings.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $150 is still a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $110. I'm willing to make a compromise, but I need to get at least $140 out of this deal. How about we meet in the middle of our last two offers at $130? It's the lowest I'm willing to go.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $130 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway from our last offer, so I'll offer $125. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $127.50, which is just a tiny bit higher than your last offer. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?

I appreciate your flexibility, but $127.50 is still a bit higher than I'm willing to pay. I'm willing to meet you halfway from our last offer, so I'll offer $124.75. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle on this one. I'm willing to make one final offer, and that's $128. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product brings, and I'm willing to compromise a bit more. Let me know if this is something you'd be willing to accept.

I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still not comfortable with $128. I'm willing to make one last offer of $122.50. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
